title: Farming Simulator 22 Greenhorn Series | E93 Organizing the Farmyard

tasks.task: Observing and conducting various agricultural tasks in Farming Simulator 22.
subtasks: Analyzing the financial situation and contracts completed during July.
Discussing the earnings from hay and straw bales, and the challenges with game bugs affecting payment.
Describing the process of turning silage bales into storage and considering future upgrades.
Highlighting the setup and maintenance of farm equipment, including rakes, cultivators, and sheds.
Exploring agricultural field management and the choreography of moving equipment and bales.
Noting the collection of in-game collectibles such as cedars and water trailers.
Highlighting decisions regarding manure management and seed replenishment in greenhouses.
Discussing future plans for expanding the farm infrastructure and acquiring new equipment.
Addressing the financial implications of debt, payments to workers, and strategies for farm maintenance.

tasks.task: Organizing the farm premises and storing equipment and crops.
subtasks: Leveling and landscaping farm areas to improve utility and aesthetics.
Transporting and storing bales of hay and silage in designated areas.
Securing farm equipment in shelters and sheds for protection from weather.
Organizing equipment for easy access, balancing frequency of use and physical location.
Storing and managing manure and waste products for agricultural benefit.
